ngiemboon: Á gʉa na pʉ̀a Mowab, mbà nkʉ̀ gẅie Cʉ̀apʉ̀a gẅie à piʼi kɔ̀ɔkɔ́ɔ, é Ssé pa Ésàlayɛ, à tsẅǐ ńtíi wɔ́b, é wɔɔn:
en: About Moab,   this is what the Lord of Armies, the God of Israel, says:

ngiemboon: Ammó gie pʉ̀a Mowab kɔ́ɔn ńdɔgɔ fáŋa, á kéen ḿmag.
en: There is no longer praise for Moab;

ngiemboon: Mé ne ńjúʼu mengyè
en: A voice cries out from Horonaim,

ngiemboon: Ngwòŋ Mowab tagá,
en: Moab will be shattered;

ngiemboon: Epʉ̀a ne ḿbʉʉ lekwɔʼɔ́ Luhid, ńgiŋe ńdʉa,
en: For on the Ascent to Luhith

ngiemboon: Pi fó jʉʼɔɔn ńkÿo, mbɔɔ wɔ̌ nyìŋ wɔ́ɔ zoŋo twó yé!
en: Flee! Save your lives!

ngiemboon: Gù Mowab, ɔ̀ kɔ̌ɔn ńzába ntʉ́m pɔ́ na mefàʼ mú lâ shúm fùʼ shú,
en: Because you trust in your works and treasures,

ngiemboon: Nyìŋ gẅie à cʉŋte kɔ̀ɔkɔ́ɔ cʉŋte,
en: The destroyer   will move against every town;

ngiemboon: Pi ná membabá mbwó Mowab,
en: Make Moab a salt marsh,  ,# 48:9 Jdg 9:45; Jr 17:6; Ezk 47:11; Zph 2:9

ngiemboon: Ndòon ee twó nyìŋ gẅie
en: The one who does

ngiemboon: Tà fó lepÿɛ́,
en: Moab has been left quiet since his youth,

ngiemboon: Áa mmó gie á gÿo, Cʉ̀apʉ̀a gɔɔn ngie alyɛ̌ʼ gie à ge túm pʉ̀a pɔ́ sele yé ńnéŋe tsɛ̀ɛ ntúʼ yendyɛ̀ʼɛ, á ne ńtóo. Pɔ́ ge gÿo fó tsɛ̀ɛ mentúʼ mie aa tsoló, é kẅile yé, éshʉ́a ntúʼ.
en: Therefore look, the days are coming    —

ngiemboon: Eshʉ́ ge gÿo kúu Mowab, ńtí ssé Kemɔ́shÿè gie pɔ́ zába ntʉ́m mǒ, ndʉŋndʉŋ páʼ shʉ́ la kú pʉ̀a Ésàlayɛ, ńtí ssé pʉ̀a Mbetɛɛ gie pɔ́ lɔ́ɔn ńguʼte.
en: Moab will be put to shame because of Chemosh,

ngiemboon: Pi pʉ̀a Mowab,
en: How can you say, “We are warriors —

ngiemboon: Mé pyagá Mowab,
en: The destroyer of Moab and its towns

ngiemboon: Mé ge pyága Mowab tà ntyě té gíŋe sag wɔ́,
en: Moab’s calamity is near at hand;

ngiemboon: Pi pie pi ee megàŋ nkwɔʼɔ́ nkáʼ pé,
en: Mourn for him, all you surrounding nations,

ngiemboon: Pi pʉ̀a tÿǒsoŋo Ndimboŋ,
en: Come down from glory; sit on parched ground,

ngiemboon: Pi pʉ̀a Aloyɛ,
en: Stand by the highway and watch,

ngiemboon: Pɔ́ ge tsɔ́ʼ ngie:
en: Moab is put to shame, indeed dismayed.

ngiemboon: Letsɔ́ʼte ntsaŋ tóo na pàga ngwòŋ ye saŋa, á na tÿǒsoŋ Oloŋ, á na ye Yatsa, á na ye Mefad,
en: “Judgment has come to the land of the plateau    #— #to Holon, Jahzah, Mephaath,

ngiemboon: mbɔɔ na ye Ndimboŋ, mbɔɔ na ye Nebo, mbɔɔ na ye Mbɛ́d-Ndimbalatayîm,
en: Dibon, Nebo, Beth-diblathaim,

ngiemboon: mbɔɔ na ye Kiliatayim, mbɔɔ na ye Mbɛ́d-Ngamuu, mbɔɔ na ye Mbɛ́d-Meyoŋ,
en: Kiriathaim, Beth-gamul, Beth-meon,

ngiemboon: mbɔɔ na ye Keliyɔd, ńgÿo ye Mbosela. Letsɔʼté ntsaŋ we Cʉ̀apʉ̀a ne sẅɛ́ʼɛ na metÿǒsoŋ ntsèm mie ée tsɛ̀ɛ ngwòŋ Mowab, é mie ée mengʉ̀ŋe, mbɔɔ mie ée ngʉ̀a shʉ̀shʉ̀a.
en: Kerioth,   Bozrah, and all the towns of the land of Moab, those far and near.

ngiemboon: «Metʉ̀ pʉ̀a Mowab pÿɛɛ,
en: Moab’s horn is chopped off;   his arm is shattered.”  # 48:25 Jb 38:15; Ps 10:15; 37:17; Ezk 30:21–24

ngiemboon: Pi ná melùʼ né Mowab, à nú tà ḿbʉ́a, ńtí nue à ne ńnyɛɛ ngie à cʉa Cʉ̀apʉ̀a, á ne ńzɛ́te ngie Mowab kele na zèʼe yé, à cʉa púʼu, mé gẅe yé.
en: “Make him drunk, because he has exalted himself against the Lord.   Moab will wallow in his own vomit, and he will also become a laughingstock.

ngiemboon: Mowab, kímte páʼ ɔ̀ kɔ̌ɔn ńgẅe Ésàlayɛ. Mé lǎ gyá yé nùɔ metsǒŋ ka? Ńtí kɔ́ ɔ̀ shwóŋo na yé tepòŋ tà ńcʉʼte twó?
en: Wasn’t Israel a laughingstock to you?   Was he ever found among thieves?  # 48:27 Jr 2:26 For whenever you speak of him you shake your head.”  # 48:27 2Kg 19:21; Jb 2:11; 16:4; 42:11; Ps 22:7; 64:8; 69:20; 109:25; Is 37:22; 51:19; Jr 15:5; 18:16; Lm 2:15; Nah 3:7

ngiemboon: Pi patsẅé Mowab,
en: Abandon the towns! Live in the cliffs,

ngiemboon: Peg ka jǔʼ páʼ mé shwóŋe
en: We have heard of Moab’s pride,

ngiemboon: «Mèŋ Cʉ̀apʉ̀a, n ne ńgɔɔn ngie: N ne ńcwoŋo ńzsé menkwaŋá mɔ́b, táʼ, anò gie pɔ́ gɔɔn, á té tsɔ́ nò wɔ́, ammó gie pɔ́ gÿo, á té tsɔ́ mmó wɔ́.»
en: I know his outburst.

ngiemboon: Áa mmó gie á gÿo,
en: Therefore, I will wail over Moab.

ngiemboon: Epʉ̀a Sibma, n ne ńdʉa gẅí,
en: I will weep for you, vine of Sibmah,

ngiemboon: Lekág pɔ́ legẅe kéen ḿmaga
en: Gladness and celebration are taken from the fertile field

ngiemboon: Epʉ̀a Eshÿemboŋ ne ńgaʼte ngie mé tó ńkẅéte wɔ́b. Ngyè yɔb ne ńgee tà ńkúu Elale pɔ́ Yahásè, ńkúu Tsowa pɔ́ Holonayîm, mbɔɔ Engalad-Selisiya. Tà mbɔɔ letʉŋ sie ée Nimlîm kéen ńcʉ́ʼʉ kwòŋo ngɔ́ʼ.
en: “There is a cry from Heshbon to Elealeh; they make their voices heard as far as Jahaz    #— #from Zoar to Horonaim and Eglath-shelishiyah #— #because even the Waters of Nimrim have become desolate.

ngiemboon: Mèŋ Cʉ̀apʉ̀a, n ne ńgɔɔn ngie: N ge gʉa ngwòŋ Mowab, é pú pyág pʉ̀a pie é gee mejʉʼ ssé, ńnuŋe pwɔʼ mbwó messé mɔ́b.
en: In Moab, I will stop” #— #this is the Lord’s declaration #— #“the one who offers sacrifices on the high place and burns incense to his gods.

ngiemboon: Áa mmó gie á gÿo, n dʉa Mowab, pâ pʉ̀a pie é tsẅé Kîi-Helɛ́sè. Awɔ̀ɔn legaʼte, à gwɔ́ pɔ́ páʼ fÿág gie e kẅɛɛ tsɛ̀ɛ letagá la. Eshúm fùʼ sie pɔ́ la pú, ńcúʼte, é kéen ḿbú ḿmag.
en: Therefore, my heart moans like flutes for Moab,   and my heart moans like flutes for the people of Kir-heres. And therefore, the wealth he has gained has perished.

ngiemboon: Mbàŋa ntsèm kéen ńkwóon metwó mɔ́b, ḿbiŋ ńzáʼte melÿò mɔ́b, pɔ́ kéen ńgwate mbwó mɔ́b, ḿbiŋ ńtʉ́m mepɔ̀ɔn.
en: Indeed, every head is bald and every beard is chopped short.   On every hand is a gash  # 48:37 Lv 19:28; 21:5; Jr 5:7; 41:5; 47:5 and sackcloth  # 48:37 Jr 4:8; 6:26; 49:3 around the waist.

ngiemboon: Áa na mepóŋ mendá mie ée Mowab, mbɔɔ mejʉʼ mie ée mángyɛ̌ ntsèm, mé ne ńjúʼu pɔ́ mentse legwé. «N ka nẅɛʼte Mowab páʼ mé nẅɛʼte ngwʉ̌ŋ gẅie é té gíŋ ne ńkẅéte na tsɔ́ mmó wɔ́ la.» Cʉ̀apʉ̀a zɔ gɔɔn.
en: On all the rooftops of Moab and in her public squares, everyone is mourning because I have shattered Moab like a jar no one wants.”   This is the Lord’s declaration.

ngiemboon: Mé nẅɛʼté Mowab! Pi kɔ́ʼ legwé! Mé cʉ́ʼʉ ńgyá pɔ́ nkàʼ Mowab! Yêe shʉ́ le! Megàŋ nkwɔʼɔ́ nkáʼ pé ntsèm pú ne ńgẅe yé, ḿbú ne ńcÿɔʼɔ!
en: “How broken it is! They wail! How Moab has turned his back! He is ashamed. Moab will become a laughingstock and a shock to all those around him.”

ngiemboon: Cʉ̀apʉ̀a ne ńgɔɔn ngie: «Ngàŋmbù aa páʼ gúmndóŋ gẅie à ne ńzie, ńtaa mbabá mé na Mowab.»
en: For this is what the Lord says:

ngiemboon: Mé kéen ḿbú ńkẅé metÿǒsoŋ,
en: The towns have    been captured,

ngiemboon: Mé pyagá Mowab!
en: Moab will be destroyed as a people

ngiemboon: Cʉ̀apʉ̀a ne ńgɔɔn ngie:
en: Panic,   pit, and trap

ngiemboon: Nyìŋ gẅie à ge gÿo ne kÿo cÿɔʼ,
en: He who flees from the panic will fall in the pit,

ngiemboon: Epʉ̀a pie é ne ńkÿo, é kÿǒ tà ńkʉ́a.
en: Those who flee will stand exhausted in Heshbon’s shadow

ngiemboon: Pi pʉ̀a Mowab, yêe ntí ngʉ̀ngʉ̀ gie e kúu gẅí le!
en: Woe to you, Moab!

ngiemboon: Táʼ, Cʉ̀apʉ̀a ne ńgɔɔn ngie:
en: Yet, I will restore the fortunes   of Moab in the last days.  # 48:47 Jr 49:6,39
